name: Rulebase
long_description: We build AI agents that help banks and fintechs QA 100% of customer interactions, flagging compliance breaches, high-risk issues, and quality gaps in real time. Our AI agent reviews calls, chats, and emails, then routes issues to the right teammates, cutting escalations by up to 30% and reducing QA review time from hours to minutes.
one_liner: AI quality assurance for financial services.
